column3: to satisfy both your sweet and savory cravings. I would highly recommend the Frittata
column4: and the Benny Goodman. The Benny Goodman comes in your typical Houston XL portion
column5: with extra runny eggs smothered in sauce. The place is also known for all you can imagine flavors of pancakes. I got toast
column7: and was impressed by the freshness. The jam for the toast-- SO GOOD. Â
